summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1531, for the improvement of Sturgis Road, from Charles Street to Atlantic Street; and Atlantic Street, from Sturgis Road to Rainier Avenue, all in the City of Seattle by constructing concrete sidewalks and wooden cross walks, together with all necessary catch basins and other appurtenances necessary for surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 16545 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
